column4: RPT-EU to investigate transparency of Internet search results -document
column5: BRUSSELS  April 17 Internet platforms such as Google  Microsoft and Yahoo! will be the subject of a widespread inquiry by European regulators to determine whether they are transparent enough in how they display search results.

column4: BRIEF-Ericsson says starts collaboration with Intel Security
column5: * Says Intel security collaborates with Ericsson to bring managed security to telecom operators
